abstract: The artist formerly known as Lauren Zettler celebrated the release of her new EP with an intimate performance at Flux Studios.
snippet: The artist formerly known as Lauren Zettler celebrated the release of her new EP with an intimate performance at Flux Studios.
lead_paragraph: Lightyear, the artist formerly known as Lauren Zettler, celebrated the release of her new EP, "All of the Miles," with an intimate performance at Flux Studios. Zettler alternated between the piano and acoustic guitar, leading a small band and two backup vocalists through a string of airtight pop-folk numbers. Well produced and thoroughly rehearsed, Lightyear is a solidly professional act from an accomplished songwriter who should soon be mentioned in the same breath with the likes of Meiko, Feist and Regina Spektor.
